text: San Marino competed in the Summer Olympic Games for the first time at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, Italy. Nine competitors, all men, took part in five events in three sports. ==Cycling== Four male cyclists represented San Marino in 1960. ;Individual road race * Salvatore Palmucci * Domenico Cecchetti * Sante Ciacci * Vito Corbelli ;Team time trial * Salvatore Palmucci * Sante Ciacci * Domenico Cecchetti * Vito Corbelli ==Shooting== Four shooters represented San Marino in 1960. ;50 m pistol * Aroldo Casali * Spartaco Cesaretti ;Trap * Leo Franciosi * Guglielmo Giusti ==Wrestling== * Vittorio Mancini - 16th place ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1960 Summer Olympics 1960 Summer Olympics
title: San Marino at the 1960 Summer Olympics
